query: WITH entities AS (SELECT id FROM core_payment_allocations WHERE (COALESCE(id > $2, true)) ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT $1) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: PaymentAllocationId", e.sequence, e.event, e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN core_payment_allocation_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.id asc, i.id, e.sequence
